price: 82. Kaadu Sheetoonak badat kaah kumtaah usuk faxam kaah yayyaaqe mari yan, kaadu wohuk kalah aka taamoomi (xisoosaa kee wohuk kalah tanim kinnuk) aba mari keenik yan, kaadu kay amrik yawqeeniih aben taama baysaanamak nanu ken kaah dacrisna iyye Yalli.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ مَن يَغُوصُونَ لَهُۥ وَيَعۡمَلُونَ عَمَلٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَكُنَّا لَهُمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-shayāṭīni man yaghūṣūna lahu wayaʿmalūna ʿamalan dūna dhālika wakunnā lahum ḥāfiẓīna
